data.name: Green Furies
data.detailed_description:
One day in a deep and dark cave lost in the dense forests of ancient Rodonia, four evil and greedy goblinettes decided that it was the time to start robbing human caravans themselves. Lately, green-skinned good-for-nothing men weren't bringing enough food and jewelry, so the girls had to take matters into their own hands. However, the amateur robbers met an obstacle right away: if they want to rob a caravan, they need to get some good equipment, but to get some good equipment they need to rob a caravan. A vicious circle, but there is a way out.

There lives a terrible monster in the darkest depths of the goblin caves. A gazer. In its sinister lair it amassed a lot of valuable equipment left by the hapless adventurers. To steal from a monster is no small task for simple goblinettes. But this story isn't about someone simple. It is about real AntiHeroines!

Green Furies is a DLC for the Heroines of Swords & Spells that brings a separate scenario along. It will show you a familiar story (assuming that you finished Act I of the Heroines of Swords & Spells) from a different point of view. It should take no less than 7 hours of gameplay to finish this 'antiheroic' DLC. Just like with the main game, the DLC is all about the story, jokes and conversations. The player will have to read a lot and, of course, understand what's unfolding before their eyes.

Anyone who decides to go down the wrong path of anti-heroism with the goblinettes should expect:
1. Four new playable characters, each with unique personality traits that affect gameplay;
2. New story and side quests with a variety of playthrough options;
3. A small but ready to be explored goblin cave;
4. Engaging bosses and some original equipment.

data.short_description: An Anti-Heroic DLC for an epic and funny jRPG adventure with intricately detailed world and story. Revisit this world and look at the familiar story through the eyes of completely different protagonists.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Alcohol consumption, Mildly strong language (without profanity), Partial nakedness
